aesthetic: Clean and minimal with purposeful use of color
Soft, approachable gradients over harsh contrasts
Premium feel through subtle details and polish
hierarchy: Clear visual hierarchy through size, weight, and color
Important information prominent and immediately visible
consistency: Repeating patterns for similar content types
Unified color language across all elements
accessibility: Sufficient color contrast for text readability
Clear focus states for keyboard navigation

motivation: Visual progress should always be clear and encouraging
Celebrate every milestone, no matter how small
Use warm, inviting colors to create positive associations
Show 'next reward' prominently to drive engagement
progression: Linear progress (1/10 punches) is always visible
Visual difference between 0, in-progress, and completed cards
rewards: Reward always visible on card (Free Coffee, 10% off, etc.)
Clear call-to-action when reward is ready to claim
History of earned rewards accessible but not prominent
simplicity: One primary action per screen (Scan, View, Redeem)
Minimal text - rely on visual indicators
Touch targets 44x44px minimum for mobile scanning
Critical info (punches remaining) in largest typography

adaptations.mobile: Single column, full-width cards, bottom navigation
adaptations.tablet: Two-column layouts possible, side navigation option

messaging.onboarding: Simple, benefit-focused (Earn rewards with every visit)
messaging.progress: Positive reinforcement (Great! You earned a punch)
